Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    App is the user interface for staff to use.
    Dessert
    Dessert is a subclass derived from Item class.
    Drinks
    Drinks is a subclass derived from Item class.
    Event
    This entity class provides all basic information from which the Order and Reservation entities can be extended from.
    Item
    Item has three types: Main course, Drinks and Dessert.
    ItemMenu
    Item Menu is the class to contain the items in Menu.
    MainCourse
    MainCourse is a subclass derived from Item class.
    MenuManager
    MenuManager is the class to control the operation of both ItemMenu and PackageMenu.
    Order
    This entity class is a subclass of the Event entity class, and stores all information relevant to a order such as DateTime, Customer Name, Pax, Table and Staff.
    OrderManager
    This control class provides all functionality related to the Order entity.
    Package
    Each package contains a set of items.
    PackageMenu
    PackageMenu contains all the package instances.
    PeriodicRefresh
    PeriodicRefresh is the class that is responsible for running the cleanReservation() method every set interval time It will take in the restaurant class as its attribute to be able to use the cleanReservation() run() is what calls the cleanReservation() and adds the period interval
    Person
    This entity class provides all basic information from which the Staff entity can be extended from.
    Reservation
    This entity class is a subclass of the Event entity class, and stores all information relevant to a reservation such as DateTime, Customer Name, Pax and Table.
    ReservationManager
    This control class provides basic functionality through methods relevant to the Reservation entity.
    Restaurant
    This control class stores an array of active event objects that are either used as reservations or orders, and calls the respective reservation/order manager classes to alter them.
    Staff
    This entity class is a subclass of the Person entity class, and stores additional information such as Employee Id and Job Title/Description.
    Table
    Each table is read from the text file while user open this system They contains a list of occupied time that is synchronous with reservation and order User is only able to edit this class from the manager class
    TableManager
    This is a static control class to edit the table.
    Timing
    Timing class is used to store in table class, order class and reservation class.
